title: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy, classic pancakes perfect for a quick breakfast or brunch.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat the milk, melted butter, egg, and vanilla extract together.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup, butter, and your favorite toppings.
author: 60d0fe4f5311236168a109ca

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A fresh and healthy chicken Caesar salad perfect for lunch or dinner.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the romaine lettuce and chicken breast.
Add the Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side.
author: 60d0fe4f5311236168a109cb

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich and savory meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and saut√© the onion and garlic until soft.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, and basil.
Simmer the sauce for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
author: 60d0fe4f5311236168a109cc
